title: Demon Heart
info: The Demon Heart is an Expert Mode and Master Mode consumable item from the Treasure Bag dropped by the Wall of Flesh. It permanently grants the player an extra accessory slot, for use only within Expert and Master worlds. This effect does not stack and may only be used once per player. If a player opens the Wall of Flesh's Treasure Bag after they have already consumed a Demon Heart, another one will not be obtained.
